description: With a hybrid design balancing durability, stretch, and water repellency, the Gamma Guide Pant meets the exacting demands of guides and mountain professionals. The thighs and seat use Burly™ double weave for abrasion resistance and weather protection. Wee Burly™ material is used on the back and lower half of the legs to shed weight and improve breathability. Harness-accessible thigh pockets hold notepads and digital tools, the lower leg unzips to fit over boots, and the clean fit is articulated for freedom of movement.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Guide Pants, Short - Mens
